author: rickhall
msg: Modified IContentLoader to include a getResourceFromContent() method to
avoid the class cast exception being reported in FELIX-149.

author: bago
msg: Each mailet/matcher is now given a child logger and does not need anymore to prepend its own name in each log call (JAMES-601).
This way we have much more control on the log granularity. This is also a good step towards having a more fine grained logging capability published to mailets.
